description.zh-cn: 美国在1950年代，基于反共主义，对于支持左派的个人与团体进行政治迫害的一系列政治行为。
description.en: A series of political persecutions in the United States during the 1950s, based on anti-communism, targeting individuals and groups supportive of the left.

description.zh-cn: 在冷战背景下，由于对苏联及共产主义扩张的恐惧，在美国社会中蔓延的恐慌情绪。
description.en: A period of widespread fear of communism and Soviet expansion that spread through American society in the context of the Cold War.

description.zh-cn: 美国共和党参议员，麦卡锡主义的代表人物。
description.en: A Republican U.S. Senator who was the most visible public face of McCarthyism.

description.zh-cn: 二战后，以美国为首的西方集团与以苏联为首的东方集团之间的长期政治、经济和军事对抗。
description.en: The prolonged political, economic, and military rivalry between the Western Bloc, led by the United States, and the Eastern Bloc, led by the Soviet Union, following World War II.

description.zh-cn: 指1949年中国共产党在中国内战中取得胜利，控制中国大陆，对美国政坛产生巨大冲击的事件。
description.en: Refers to the victory of the Chinese Communist Party in the Chinese Civil War in 1949, which resulted in their control of mainland China and had a significant impact on American politics.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国与大韩民国之间的战争，美国等联合国军队支持韩国，中国人民志愿军支持朝鲜。
description.en: A war between North Korea and South Korea, in which the United States and other UN forces supported the South, and the Chinese People's Volunteer Army supported the North.

nodes.id: 众议院非美活动调查委员会

zh-cn: 众议院非美活动调查委员会
众议院非美调查委员会

description.zh-cn: 美国众议院的一个调查委员会，在麦卡锡主义时期积极调查被指控的共产主义活动。
description.en: An investigative committee of the U.S. House of Representatives that was prominent for its anti-communist investigations during the McCarthy era.

description.zh-cn: 美国联邦调查局（FBI）首任局长，是美国历史上最有权势的反共人物之一。
description.en: The first Director of the Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) and one of the most powerful anti-communist figures in American history.

description.zh-cn: 第14任美国首席大法官，其领导下的最高法院（沃伦法院）通过一系列判决，协助终结了麦卡锡主义。
description.en: The 14th Chief Justice of the United States, whose Supreme Court (the Warren Court) made a series of decisions that helped to end McCarthyism.

en: Supreme Court of the United States

description.zh-cn: 美国联邦政府的最高司法机构。
description.en: The highest judicial body in the United States federal government.

description.zh-cn: 指美国最高法院由首席大法官厄尔·沃伦领导的时期，以其在民权和公民自由方面的里程碑式判决而闻名。
description.en: Refers to the period when the U.S. Supreme Court was led by Chief Justice Earl Warren, known for its landmark decisions in civil rights and civil liberties.

description.zh-cn: 拒绝雇佣被怀疑与共产主义有联系的娱乐业专业人士的做法，导致数百人失业。
description.en: The practice of denying employment to entertainment industry professionals believed to be associated with communism, which resulted in hundreds losing their jobs.

description.zh-cn: 1947年因拒绝在众议院非美活动调查委员会前作证而被判藐视国会的十位电影业人士。
description.en: Ten motion-picture professionals who were cited for contempt of Congress in 1947 for refusing to testify before the House Un-American Activities Committee.

description.zh-cn: 美国编剧和小说家，是“好莱坞十君子”之一，被列入好莱坞黑名单。
description.en: An American screenwriter and novelist who was one of the 'Hollywood Ten' and was placed on the Hollywood blacklist.

description.zh-cn: 美国广播记者和新闻分析家，其在《See It Now》节目中对麦卡锡的批评被认为是麦卡锡主义终结的关键。
description.en: An American broadcast journalist and news analyst whose criticism of McCarthy on his show 'See It Now' is considered a key moment in the downfall of McCarthyism.

description.zh-cn: 由美国参议院永久调查小组委员会举行的系列听证会，调查陆军与参议员麦卡锡之间的冲突。听证会的电视直播严重损害了麦卡锡的公众形象。
description.en: A series of hearings held by the U.S. Senate's Permanent Subcommittee on Investigations to investigate conflicting accusations between the U.S. Army and Senator McCarthy. The televised hearings severely damaged McCarthy's public image.

description.zh-cn: 美国国会的两院之一。
description.en: One of the two chambers of the United States Congress.

description.zh-cn: 冷战的爆发以及对苏联在欧洲扩张的担忧是第二次红色恐慌的主要背景。
description.en: The outbreak of the Cold War and fears of Soviet expansion in Europe were the primary context for the Second Red Scare.

description.zh-cn: 1949年中国共产党在中国大陆的胜利加剧了美国对共产主义威胁的恐惧。
description.en: The victory of the Chinese Communist Party in mainland China in 1949 intensified fears of a communist threat in the United States.

description.zh-cn: 1950年朝鲜战争的爆发进一步提升了对共产主义势力扩张的恐惧。
description.en: The outbreak of the Korean War in 1950 further elevated fears of communist expansion.

description.zh-cn: 麦卡锡主义是在第二次红色恐慌的时代背景下形成的一种政治风潮。
description.en: McCarthyism was a political trend that formed against the backdrop of the Second Red Scare.

description.zh-cn: 约瑟夫·麦卡锡是麦卡锡主义的代表人物，他通过一系列指控和调查，推动了这场反共运动。
description.en: Joseph McCarthy was the figurehead of McCarthyism, driving the anti-communist movement through a series of accusations and investigations.

relationships.source: 众议院非美活动调查委员会

description.zh-cn: 众议院非美活动调查委员会是麦卡锡时代进行反共调查的主要政府机构之一。
description.en: The House Un-American Activities Committee was one of the main government bodies conducting anti-communist investigations during the McCarthy era.

description.zh-cn: 作为FBI局长，约翰·埃德加·胡佛设计了联邦政府的忠诚审查计划，并利用FBI的权力广泛进行反共调查，是麦卡锡主义的重要推动者。
description.en: As Director of the FBI, J. Edgar Hoover designed the federal government's loyalty review program and used the Bureau's power to conduct extensive anti-communist investigations, making him a key driver of McCarthyism.

relationships.source: 众议院非美活动调查委员会

description.zh-cn: “好莱坞十君子”因拒绝在众议院非美活动调查委员会前作证而被判藐视国会罪并入狱。
description.en: The 'Hollywood Ten' were convicted of contempt of Congress and imprisoned for refusing to testify before the House Un-American Activities Committee.

description.zh-cn: 作为“好莱坞十君子”之一，道尔顿·特兰波被列入好莱坞黑名单，导致其在多年内无法以自己的名义工作。
description.en: As one of the 'Hollywood Ten', Dalton Trumbo was placed on the Hollywood blacklist, preventing him from working under his own name for many years.

description.zh-cn: 沃伦法院作出了一系列重要判决，如“耶茨诉美国案”和“沃特金斯诉美国案”，限制了政府以共产主义关联为由进行迫害的权力，从而协助终结了麦卡锡主义。
description.en: The Warren Court made a series of key decisions, such as Yates v. United States and Watkins v. United States, which limited the government's power to persecute based on communist affiliation, thereby helping to end McCarthyism.

description.zh-cn: 厄尔·沃伦作为首席大法官领导美国最高法院的时期被称为“沃伦法院”。
description.en: The period when Earl Warren led the U.S. Supreme Court as Chief Justice is known as the 'Warren Court'.

description.zh-cn: 爱德华·默罗在其电视节目《See It Now》中播出了直接批评约瑟夫·麦卡锡的报道，严重损害了麦卡锡的公众形象，被认为是麦卡锡主义终结的关键一章。
description.en: Edward R. Murrow broadcast a report directly criticizing Joseph McCarthy on his television program 'See It Now', which severely damaged McCarthy's public image and is considered a key chapter in the end of McCarthyism.

description.zh-cn: 在被电视直播的陆军—麦卡锡听证会上，麦卡锡的粗暴方式方法暴露在全国观众面前，使其公众形象大打折扣。
description.en: During the televised Army-McCarthy hearings, McCarthy's aggressive tactics were exposed to a national audience, greatly diminishing his public image.

description.zh-cn: 美国参议院以65票对22票通过了对约瑟夫·麦卡锡的谴责案，实质上终结了其作为反共势力主力的政治生涯。
description.en: The U.S. Senate voted 65 to 22 to censure Joseph McCarthy, effectively ending his political career as a leading anti-communist force.
